data.persona: We are villagers from a small village.  We spend most of our time working in the fields.  We enjoy visiting the local tavern in the evening.
data.description:
You are in the Inside cottage kitchen.
A small, quaint kitchen. Pots and pans fill the ceiling and make a clamor on a windy day. A small squat table, surrounding by four chairs, sit in the back of the kitchen. A small wood burning stove is seen upon entering.
There's a pan, a table, and a Napkin here.
The cooker and the man are here.

You are carrying a purse, wearing a Cloak, and wielding a sandal.

data.short_motivation: I must pay the protection money to the man
data.mid_motivation: I need to ensure I can keep my business open
data.long_motivation: I need to keep my business open in order to feed my family and help the village grow
